Package serverSide.objects

Class Museum

java.lang.Object
serverSide.objects.Museum
All Implemented Interfaces:
MuseumInterface, Remote
public class Museum extends Object implements MuseumInterface
Museum. Is implemented as an implicit monitor. All public methods are executed in mutual exclusion. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on Java RMI.
